lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : HARIKIRI/Bohan/Maswei/Jmag
[00:09.067]baby除了你我一无所有
[00:11.785]baby除了你我一无所有
[00:14.132]告诉我今晚你有没有空
[00:16.771]就让我开着i8带你兜风
[00:19.355]
[00:19.504]告诉我你想干嘛
[00:20.993]ayy, I’m tryna be with you girl I really wanna be with you
[00:24.124]u dont need think too much
[00:26.192]I ain’t really wanna play with you
[00:28.656]girl I really wanna be with you
[00:30.555]
[00:31.510]seen you from across the room
[00:33.261]damn girl you fine in that dress
[00:35.911]damn you fine in that dress
[00:39.408]let me address
[00:40.347]
[00:40.546]girl you got me asking
[00:41.971]about you and your past men
[00:43.195]damn I like your fashion
[00:44.547]and the way you laughing
[00:45.457]your ex-man not romancing
[00:46.688]them other girls be acting
[00:48.240]but you got the real deal
[00:49.491]shot me, ain’t no Kill Bill
[00:50.823]I can’t have no ill will
[00:52.160]fresh ones call me real Will
[00:53.359]and you can say I got the keys to your heart
[00:55.429]and we gon’ always be together
[00:56.786]ain’t no growing apart
[00:58.006]just let me say that you done kept it real
[00:59.651]and way from the start,
[01:00.412]I’m in love
[01:01.558]I’m in love

[01:04.224]I’m in love

[01:15.171](don’t think too much baby)
[01:16.269]
[01:16.436]坐下  坐上我的副驾
[01:18.849]你打扮的还是一样  很热辣
[01:21.411]我有时太忙 忙着把势力扩大

[01:26.516]
[01:26.650]来 ay 送给我的女孩

[01:31.408]rose gold Cartier 跑车我有几台

[01:36.819]

[01:39.983]我唱歌的时候像 Bobby Brown
[01:42.649]交出心把这份爱成交
[01:44.328]有你在我身边 出门不需要带润唇膏
[01:47.144]
[01:47.527]she don’t need no diamonds she already shine
[01:49.897]ain’t no need denying she been on my mind
[01:52.418]I stay on the grind I ain’t got the time
[01:55.072]little does she know that she’s all I want, yeah
[01:57.772]不要依靠别人我们自己来
[02:00.129]只要我们感觉对就不奇怪
[02:02.715]就算什么都没有我们还有爱

[02:07.933]
